Claim prizes, rewards and other things.

**Usage**

- `/claim name:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The thing you want to claim. | - |
